attributes.action: PLEASE PUT MR BRUCE FORSYTH FORWARD TO BECOME SIR BRUCE FORSYTH ON THE NEXT HONOURS LIST
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MR FORSYTH HAS GIVEN MANY YEARS TO THE ENTERTAINMENT INDUSTRY AND HAS ALSO DONE MUCH FOR CHARITY. HE IS A FAVOURITE CELEBRITY OF THE COMMON PEOPLE AND ABOVE ALL IS A CONSUMATE PROFESSIONAL LOVED BY ALL GENERATIONS. HE DESERVES TO BE RECOGNISED AND HAS BEEN OVERLOOKED FOR FAR TOO LONG.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Knightbrucie/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
